name: R3_v2_0356_for_R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R3.v2 Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0356|2.8.2 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R3 to R4B.

concept.display: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".
This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.
This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .

contains.display: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".
This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.
This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .
